section.name: ImageAcquisition
section.definition: Properties to define an Image acquisition device. This can be a framegrabber, a camera etc.

property.name: InventoryNo
property.definition: The inventory number of the device.

property.name: SerialNo
property.definition: The device's serial number.

property.name: Model
property.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

property.name: Manufacturer
property.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

property.name: Owner
property.definition: Who's the owner of the device.

property.name: Type
property.definition: The kind of image acquisition device.

property.name: Mount
property.definition: The lens mount (there are many more).

property.name: Colorspace
property.definition: The kind of image acquisition device.

property.name: DetektorType
property.definition: The kind of image acquisition device.

property.name: SensitivityRange
property.definition: The sensitivity range of the detector (min - max).

property.name: MinFramerate
property.definition: The minimal framerate of the image acquisition system (Camera, framegrabber, etc.).

property.name: MaxFramerate
property.definition: The maximum framerate of the image acquisition system (Camera, framegrabber, etc.).

property.name: Framerate
property.definition: The actual framerate of the image acquisition system (Camera, framegrabber, etc.).

property.name: SpatialRes
property.definition: The spatial resolution of the acquired images (width x height).

property.name: Lens
property.definition: This property can be used to specify which kind of optics have been used.

property.name: ShutterSpeed
property.definition: The speed of the shutter, given in seconds or milliseconds.

property.name: Apperture
property.definition: The actual apperture (e.g. 5.6).

property.name: CCDGain
property.definition: The gain of a ccd chip.

property.name: Depth
property.definition: The brightness resolution e.g. lower 8 bit.

property.name: RoiPositionX
property.definition: The position of the region of interest on the CCD chip. Usually given in pixel describing the top left corner relative to the chip origin (also the top left corner).

property.name: RoiPositionY
property.definition: The position of the region of interest on the CCD chip. Usually given in pixel describing the top left corner relative to the chip origin (also the top left corner).

property.name: RoiWidth
property.definition: The width of the region of interest. Given in pixels.

property.name: RoiHeight
property.definition: The height of the region of interest. Given in pixels.

property.name: PicRotation
property.definition: The rotation of the picture. (e.g. +180degrees).

property.name: Brightness
property.definition: The brightness adjustment.

property.name: Contrast
property.definition: The contrast adjustment.

property.name: Gamma
property.definition: The gamma value.

property.name: GammaFuntion
property.definition: The gamma calibration function.

property.name: PixelBinning
property.definition: The type of pixel binning on the chip.

property.name: Subsampling
property.definition: The subsampling method used on the chip.

property.name: ColorTemperature
property.definition: The color temperature.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A description of this hardware item.
